title: Caribeans Coffee and Chocolate Factory
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Caribbean
description: Local producer of organic fair trade coffee and chocolate. Serves light vegetarian food, coffee, ice cream, and breakfast. The chocolate factory is still open. Re-opened at new location Sept 2012.
streetAddress: Playa Cocles 25 mts North of Cabinas El Tesoro
